ARABIC: يُصْهَرُ بِهِۦ مَا فِى بُطُونِهِمْ وَٱلْجُلُودُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: which will melt the contents of their bellies as well as their skin,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Which will dissolve everything within their bellies, and their skins.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: causing (not only) their skins but all that is in their bellies as well to melt away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It will melt their skins and all that is in their bellies.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: With which will melt what is in their bellies, and their skins.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: With it will melt (or vanish away) what is within their bellies, as well as (their) skins.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: With it shall be melted what is in their bellies and (their) skins as well.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: whereby whatsoever is in their bellies and their skins shall be melted;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Whereby that which is in their bellies, and their skins too, will be melted;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: anything in their stomachs as well as their skins will be melted by it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Molten thereby shall be that which is in their bellies and also their skins.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: with which their skins and entrails will fuse,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: With it will be scalded what is within their bodies, as well as (their) skins.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: With it will melt or vanish away what is within their bellies, as well as (their) skins.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and that which is in their bellies and their skins shall be melted;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Melting their insides and their skins.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: By which is melted that within their bellies and [their] skins.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [22:20] whereby will be melted that which is in their bellies, of fats and otherwise, and, whereby will be grilled, their skins.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Whereby that which is in their bellies) of fat and other things, (and their skins too, will be melted;
